results.title: Communicating in a team
results.brief_description: This video is a guide as to how to communicate better in a team environment. The first recommended step is to accept the diversity of the modern workplace and the array of backgrounds of staff members. This means having patience and understanding that those from another cultural background may find it harder to absorb instructions. Tolerance is the key to successful team environments. The second recommended step is to participate in meetings, listen to each other and show interest, stay on track, and do not divert from the meeting’s main topic; be open to ideas, don’t jump in early and trounce others’ ideas. Lastly, ask your manager for feedback. Be specific and probe for precise ways in which to improve your performance.

results.title: Communicate to live

results.title: Commonwealth of Nations
results.brief_description: The nature, extent and constitution of the British Commonwealth - its purpose, benefits derived from it and the relationship among its members. The historical background is presented, beginning 200 years ago when British colonies were scattered in newly discovered lands all over the world. The seed of the Commonwealth was germinated when Canada was granted her independence. Contains historical footage of 1950s Sydney.

results.title: Commonwealth Arts Festival
results.brief_description: A film record of the highlights from the Commonwealth Arts Festival held in Britain in 1965. For 17 days, in London, Cardiff, Liverpool and Glasgow, there were performances of music, drama, dancing, films and verse, as well as art exhibitions. More than 20 Commonwealth countries brought their finest talents and exhibits to Britain for the occasion.

results.title: Commonsense behind the wheel
results.brief_description: The film opens with a casualty case in a hospital after a traffic accident. Rules for safe driving are enumerated and explained with practical demonstrations. Shows the need for correct hand signals and also the disastrous effects of driving whilst under the influence of alcohol.
